input.sentences: a group of people is gathered in a church .
there is a church sale and bake sale going on .
the people look through all of the stuff seeing what they would like to purchase .
the people taking the picture got so excited that the picture was blurry .
everyone was very happy with their purchases .
output.sentences: There was a big event where people gathered at the church.
People crowded inside the church for the annual bake sale.
It's unbelievable the stuff people are willing to purchase.
It was hard to get pictures of people because everyone was busy talking.
Everyone went home happy with their purchases.
